verses.text: <a href="../2-Corinthians-2-1/" title="2 Corinthians 2:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"But I determined this with myself, that I would not come again to you in heaviness.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-2/" title="2 Corinthians 2:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"For if I make you sorry, who is he then that maketh me glad, but the same which is made sorry by me?
3 "JESUS_END"And I wrote this same unto you, lest, when I came, I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy is the joy of you all.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-4/" title="2 Corinthians 2:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears; not that ye should be grieved, but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-5/" title="2 Corinthians 2:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"But if any have caused grief, he hath not grieved me, but in part: that I may not overcharge you all.
6 "JESUS_END"Sufficient to such a man is this punishment, which was inflicted of many.
7 "JESUS_END"So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him, and comfort him, lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow.
8 "JESUS_END"Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-9/" title="2 Corinthians 2:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"For to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether ye be obedient in all things.
10 "JESUS_END"To whom ye forgive any thing, I forgive also: for if I forgave any thing, to whom I forgave it, for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ;

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-11/" title="2 Corinthians 2:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices.
12 "JESUS_END"Furthermore, when I came to Troas to preach Christ's gospel, and a door was opened unto me of the Lord,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-13/" title="2 Corinthians 2:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"I had no rest in my spirit, because I found not Titus my brother: but taking my leave of them, I went from thence into Macedonia.
14 "JESUS_END"Now thanks be unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-15/" title="2 Corinthians 2:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ, in them that are saved, and in them that perish:
16 "JESUS_END"To the one we are the savour of death unto death; and to the other the savour of life unto life. And who is sufficient for these things?

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-17/" title="2 Corinthians 2:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"For we are not as many, which corrupt the word of God: but as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God speak we in Christ.
